name: Burg_18
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole loanwords
diet: salted fish and fermented seaweed
shipwright craft mixed with ritual practice
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Rituals consume scarce imported reagents or specialized labor
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Navigational auguries exist but do not replace charts or seamanship
